mapper.insert: insert into board values(#{no}, #{bigcate}, #{smallcate}, #{title}, #{imgpath}, #{price}, #{writer}, sysdate, null, #{content},0,0)
mapper.select: select * from board order by no desc
select * from board join bigcate on board.bigcate = bigcate.no where board.bigcate = #{bigcate}
select * from board where title like #{searchKey} or content like #{searchKey}

select * from board join (select * from bigcate join smallcate on bigcate.NO = smallcate.BIGNO )a on board.bigcate = a.bigno and board.smallcate = a.smallno where board.bigcate=#{bigcate} and board.smallcate=#{smallcate}

select * from (select a.*, rownum as rnum from(select * from board join bigcate on board.bigcate = bigcate.No where board.bigcate =#{bigcate} order by board.wrdate desc) a where rownum <= ${endCount } ) where rnum >= ${startCount }

select * from (select a.*, rownum as rnum from(select * from board join (select*from bigcate join smallcate on bigcate.NO = smallcate.BIGNO )a on board.bigcate = a.bigno and board.smallcate = a.smallno where board.bigcate =#{bigcate} and board.smallcate=#{smallcate } order by board.wrdate desc ) a where rownum <= ${endCount } ) WHERE RNUM >= ${startCount }
select * from (select a.*, rownum as rnum from(select * from board where writer=#{writer} order by board.wrdate desc) a where rownum <= ${endCount } ) where rnum >= ${startCount }
mapper.update: update board set price=#{price}, content=#{content} where no=#{no}
update board set imgpath=#{imgpath}, price=#{price}, content=#{content} where no=#{no}
update board set price=#{price}, addr=#{addr}, content=#{content} where no=#{no}
